task.title: Taper Faces
task.shortdesc: You can taper the selected face at the specified angle around a baseline. The rotation direction depends on the sequence of specifying the base point.

context.p: Positive angle tapers faces in and negative angle tapers faces out. The angle should not be too large in order to the tapered face shrinks to a point before reaching the specified height.

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Solids Editing > Taper Faces from the main menu.
Select the face(s) to taper, andpress Enter.
Specify another point along the axis.

result.p: Left: Specify the face(s) to taper (A), a base point(B), a second point along the taper axis(C), and a taper angle
Right: The resulting entity with the face tapered to position(D)
